comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Kenneth Triest, a 19 years old American student (his father was of German origin), enlisted in the British navy. He was then imprisoned and charged with being a German spy. As a result of American pressure, he was released and sent back to the USA. He arrived on the American liner St. Paul on November 28, 1915, see New-York tribune., November 29, 1915, Page 1 (with similar Photo).
